name: P.S. I love u
description:
I got by with a little help from my friends...

This is my submission for Game A Week 2022, week 4: "caring"

Thanks to Stuffed Wombat for the movement code, and to Pedro Reñé for lending me his song, which I recorded as an improvised cover. You can listen to the (much better) original version here.

Arrows to move and R to restart if you get stuck!
